title: Newton's Second Law
text: Newton's second law states that the net force on an object equals mass times acceleration: F = m a. It implies acceleration is proportional to force and inversely proportional to mass.

title: Ohm's Law
text: In an electrical circuit, Ohm's law relates voltage V, current I, and resistance R: V = I R.

title: Gene expression and differential expression
text: Differential expression analysis compares gene expression between conditions to identify genes whose expression levels change significantly. Follow-up experiments include qPCR validation, knockdown/overexpression studies, and pathway assays.

title: Hypothesis and experiment design
text: A testable hypothesis proposes a mechanism and a prediction. A good follow-up experiment isolates variables, includes controls, and yields measurable outcomes to confirm or refute the hypothesis.
